mapper.select: SELECT MEM_SEQ,MEM_ID,MEM_IMAGE,MEM_NAME,MEM_B_NAME FROM LJP_MEMBER ORDER BY MEM_SEQ ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LJP_MEMBER (MEM_SEQ,MEM_ID,MEM_PW,MEM_IMAGE,MEM_EMAIL,MEM_NAME,MEM_ADDRESS,MEM_PHONE, MEM_B_NAME,MEM_B_STATUS,MEM_ISADMIN,MEM_ISAPPROVE,MEM_ISDEL,MEM_REGDATE,MEM_LOGINTIME,MEM_LOGOUTTIME) VALUES (ljp_member_seq.nextval,#{mem_id}, #{mem_pw}, '/profile/default.jpg', #{mem_email}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_address}, #{mem_phone}, #{mem_b_name}, #{mem_b_status}, 0, 0, 0, SYSDATE, NULL, NULL)
mapper.update: UPDATE LJP_MEMBER SET MEM_ISDEL = 1 WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id}
